Package fotoshop

fotoshop package contains the primary image editor and various command processing methods.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ColorImage
    Extends standard BufferedImage class with convenience functions for getting/setting pixel values using the standard Color class and converting the raster to a standard 24-bit direct colour format.
    Command
    This class is adapted from the "World of Zuul" application.
    CommandWords
    This class is derived from the "World of Zuul" application, author Michael Kolling and David J.
    Editor
    Adapted from the fotoshop assignment example by Richard Jones
    FileManager  
    ImageCache  
    ImageStack
    Image stack stores a stack of ColorImage instances up to the maximum.
    Main
    This is the main class for the Fotoshop application Creates an editor and controller.
    Parser
    This class is taken from the "World of Zuul" application.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    CommandWord
    Representations for all the valid command words for the game along with a string in a particular language.

Package fotoshop Description

fotoshop package contains the primary image editor and various command processing methods.
See Also:
ColorImage: Represents the images being worked on in the application. Extends BufferedImage.
Command: A command to be processed by the application.
CommandWord: Enum of the available commands in the application.
CommandWords: Contains all the available viable commands and translated versions.
Editor: Main editor of the application. Processes commands and sends relevant updates to other classes.
FileManager: Handles the saving and opening of files.
ImageCache: A cache of images being worked on. Contains a map of ImageStack objects and methods for adding to, or retrieving from this map
ImageStack: Stores a particular image and its various instances. Includes methods for adding to or retrieving images from this stack.
Main: Simply creates the main GUI and Editor objects..
